LanguageData.AgonyPulse.label: agony pulse
LanguageData.AgonyPulse.description: Generate a pulse of psychic pain emanating from a target location.
LanguageData.ConsumeLeap_Devourer.label: consume leap
LanguageData.ConsumeLeap_Devourer.description: Leap onto a target and begin digesting it.
LanguageData.CorrosiveSpray.label: corrosive spray
LanguageData.CorrosiveSpray.description: Use the corrosive heart to spray acid a short distance. The heart pumps the corrosive fluid through a surgically implanted duct, allowing the ghoul to spew it from their mouth at high velocity.
LanguageData.EntitySkip.label: entity skip
LanguageData.FleshmelterBolt.label: fleshmelter bolt
LanguageData.FleshmelterBolt.description: Launch a large bolt of energy which generates a high-temperature explosion.
LanguageData.GhoulFrenzy.label: ghoul frenzy
LanguageData.GhoulFrenzy.description: Use the adrenal heart to saturate the bloodstream with stress hormones and liquid energy, permitting the ghoul to move and attack at incredible speeds for a short time.
LanguageData.Heatspikes.label: heatspikes
LanguageData.Heatspikes.description: Fire a burst of low-accuracy energy bolts.
LanguageData.MetalbloodInjection.label: metalblood injection
LanguageData.MetalbloodInjection.description: Use the metalblood heart to release metalblood serum into the bloodstream, reducing incoming damage for a short period of time.
LanguageData.PsychicSlaughter.label: psychic slaughter
LanguageData.PsychicSlaughter.description: Use dark psychic power to induce chaotic reconfiguration of flesh. This kills a flesh creature in seconds and converts its body into a pile of twisted flesh.
LanguageData.ReleaseDeadlifeDust.label: release deadlife dust
LanguageData.ReleaseDeadlifeDust.description: Release a cloud of dust-like substance that will settle on nearby corpses and raise them as shamblers. The shamblers will only attack your enemies. Deadlife dust is made of nano-scale archites that penetrate and reanimate dead tissue at the cellular level.
LanguageData.ReleaseDeadlifeDust.verbProperties.label: release deadlife dust
LanguageData.RevenantInvisibility.label: revenant invisibility
LanguageData.RevenantInvisibility.description: Use the revenant vertebrae to temporarily turn invisible. The prosthetic manipulates the visual centers of those nearby, letting the user pass unnoticed.
LanguageData.ShapeFlesh.label: shape flesh
LanguageData.ShapeFlesh.description: Induce a dark archotech to reconfigure a corpse into a horrendous fleshbeast. The fleshbeast will be hostile to all humans, including the one who created it.
LanguageData.SpikeLaunch_Fingerspike.label: spike launch
LanguageData.SpikeLaunch_Fingerspike.description: Launch a bone spike at a target.
LanguageData.SpikeLaunch_Toughspike.label: spike launch
LanguageData.SpikeLaunch_Toughspike.description: Launch a bone spike at a target.
LanguageData.SpineLaunch_Gorehulk.label: spine launch
LanguageData.SpineLaunch_Gorehulk.description: Launch a keratin spine at a target to do damage.
LanguageData.TransmuteSteel.label: transmute steel
LanguageData.TransmuteSteel.description: Reconfigure steel at the atomic level, turning it into a random valuable material. Can target a stack of steel or a steel slag chunk.
LanguageData.TransmuteSteel.comps.CompAbilityEffect_T: Must target steel, steel slag chunks, steel buildings, or steel items.
LanguageData.UnnaturalCorpseSkip.label: entity skip
LanguageData.UnnaturalHealing.label: unnatural healing
LanguageData.UnnaturalHealing.description: Use dark psychic influence to heal someone. The process will stop bleeding, restore blood loss, and can even heal significant injuries. However, it may also have unexpected side effects.
LanguageData.VoidTerror.label: void terror
LanguageData.VoidTerror.description: Psychically induce terrifying hallucinations, causing a person to flee in terror.
